page.title: 19The little ball of .....?
page.content: They were left all alone in a ball of hay in a shed. We'd always kept an eye on them, even when their mother had gone, but they didn't know. Then one day we saw that they were really cold, and brought them down to home. Under a lamp I put them, in their own little tin box. They squealed and squeaked and I said, "Please stop," because my eyes filled up with tears. Then I thought, "What about food?" They'd had nothing to eat all day. But after I'd fed them I thought, "How come there's only 2?" There had been 3 but now ..... My mind just stopped. My eyes filled up, and I asked my mum when she walked in. I felt so .....funny, that I began to cry and tears rolled down my face. But my hedgehogs are still here today.
